name: Format\ConditionalButton
description: The object for defining a button component's conditional properties, and when the conditional properties are in effect.

properties.name: conditions
properties.description: An instance or array of conditions that, when met, cause the conditional component properties to take effect.

properties.name: anchor
properties.description: An object that defines vertical alignment with another component.

properties.name: animation
properties.description:
An object that defines an animation to be applied to the component.
To remove a previously set condition, use none.

properties.name: behavior
properties.description: An object that defines behavior for a component, like  or .

properties.name: hidden
properties.description: A Boolean value that determines whether the component is hidden.

properties.name: layout
properties.description:
An inline ComponentLayout object that contains layout information, or a string reference to a ComponentLayout object that is defined at the top level of the document.
If layout is not defined, size and position are based on various factors, such as the device type, the length of the content, and the role of this component.

properties.name: style
properties.description: An inline ComponentStyle object that defines the appearance of this component, or a string reference to a ComponentStyle object that is defined at the top level of the document.

properties.name: textStyle
properties.description: An inline ComponentTextStyle object that contains styling information, or a string reference to a ComponentTextStyle object that is defined at the top level of the document.
